strIntroduction: 曾於2012年舉辦世界博覽會的麗水，擁有秀麗的山水風光，其中最具代表性的麗水鐵道自行車，吹著海風，全程欣賞無敵海景，絕對是視覺上的一大饗宴！
strTitle: 【大邱出發】順天灣庭園＋麗水鐵道自行車＋梧桐島一日遊

strIntroduction: Have you drew a plan for the coming summer vacation yet? Various and exciting water sports on Hangang River will surely satisfied you! You can not only have a first ride of "Running Man's recommendation- Water Blop Jump", but enjoy the scenery of Seoul City on this well-known sightseeing spot.
strTitle: Water Blob Jump on Hangang River

strIntroduction: 來到濟州島不好好享受海上生活怎麼行？搭乘潛水艇深入海底世界探訪神秘的牛島，下潛距離30公尺、移動距離長達500公尺，是韓國移動最長的水下旅行呢！趕緊一塊兒潛入海中，一覽陸地上無法窺探的神秘美景與深海璀璨的秘寶吧！
strTitle: Jeju Cattle Ialand Submarine Tour

strIntroduction: 夏日炎炎，最享受的就是一家大小一起去溪邊踏踏，享受溪水的沁涼了！到了韓國當然不能錯過最近蔚為流行的農村體驗啦，快跟著KKday到鄉下走一趟，自然農莊體驗、溪上抓魚、乘坐木筏及乘坐水陸兩用車，一窺韓國最淳樸的樣貌！
strTitle: 【一起FUN假趣】 韓國風之村農村體驗，自己吃的魚自己抓！

strIntroduction: 今年暑假，讓我們帶你走進童話國度-松月童話壁畫村，探訪仁川最美麗的村落，再暢遊韓國超人氣樂園One Mount，搭乘超長超刺激急速滑梯，雪橇滑梯及溜冰體驗。不僅讓小朋友玩得開心，大朋友也盡興！
strTitle: One Mount水上樂園＋松月童話村一日遊

strIntroduction: 韓國最大型的觀光郵輪「美男號」帶你暢遊麗水、順天山水風光！麗水市風景秀麗，2012年曾舉辦世界博覽會而一躍成為世界級觀光勝地，搭著美男號沿著韓國全羅南道海邊，來場畢生難忘的奢華之旅吧！
strTitle: 【大邱出發】韓國最大郵輪！暢遊麗水、順天海景風光

strIntroduction: 今年暑假，讓我們帶你到農場裡製作起司、採摘新鮮葡萄及製作獨家秘製水餃！各項超新奇的特色體驗絕對適合親子及情侶一同享樂！
strTitle: 【Fun遊京畿道】牛牛村 x 葡萄農莊 x 餃子料理DIY一日遊

strIntroduction: 有聽過「鐵路自行車」嗎？將廢棄鐵路大改造的鐵路自行車，在騎腳踏車的同時不僅可以欣賞周遭的風景，更與親朋好友共度歡樂時光，感情絕對up up up!來韓國有沒有哪些一定要玩？非他莫屬，韓國人最愛的戶外活動等你來體驗！
strTitle: Jeju Rail Bike Ticket

strIntroduction: With KKday airport shuttle service, you don't have to carpool with others!
strTitle: ICN airport to Seoul shuttle service (within defined area)

strIntroduction: 引領時尚潮流的韓國，首爾美容美景之旅～韓國服裝、配飾、化妝品、美容技術一直受到國內外愛美人士的熱烈追捧。體驗韓國美容文化，化身美麗妖精現身愛莉薇絲麗、Heyri藝術村、普羅旺斯村～
strTitle: 【首爾美麗日記】愛莉薇絲麗美麗城 Heyri藝術村 普羅旺斯村

strIntroduction: 想要自由行又擔心交通轉車不方便?自助包車旅遊除了專屬座車及司機導覽之外，亦可協助調整建議行程安排，讓您的韓國自助旅遊零障礙。除此之外，還有機會搭乘加拿大華人插畫家 Andrew Hou筆下人物的聯名車款，讓你輕輕鬆鬆玩遍首爾！
strTitle: 【就愛自由行】首爾包車自助旅遊服務

strIntroduction: 韓國除了逛街吃美食，還有什麼好玩的啊？這次帶您踏出首爾，走訪南楊州綜合攝影場，一窺韓國電影的夢工廠！再到韓國人的後花園－晨靜樹木園踏青，最後搭上江村ATV越野車，結束豐富而意猶未盡的一天！
strTitle: 韓國南楊州電影城 x 晨靜樹木園 x ATV越野車一日遊

strIntroduction: 喜歡露營嗎？想親自體驗韓國人露營文化有什麼不一樣嗎？KKDAY帶您到韓國享受野外露營的樂趣，在韓國市郊最美的角落留下與眾不同的回憶！別再猶豫了，快跟我們一起出發露營去！
strTitle: 出發露營去！南怡島＋晨靜樹木園＋兩水里＋龍門山二日遊

strIntroduction: 為韓國流行文化著迷的你，是否有想過有天自己也能像韓國明星一樣呢？不要懷疑就是現在，在韓劇勝地－小法國村，由專業梳化團隊為你打造全新韓風造型；國家認可的頂級攝影師全程跟拍，體驗與眾不同的明星日常！
strTitle: 【韓風寫真外拍】小法國村時尚跟拍

strIntroduction: 難得來到景色NO.1的濟州島，如果只有在＂陸地上＂渡假而沒有來到＂海上＂享受實在是浪費了濟州的美景。想乘著遊艇徜徉在藍天碧海中，享受大自然帶給你的豪華饗宴嗎？那就跟著KKDay搭乘豪華遊艇、欣賞自然美景，讓這次的濟州島之行終生難忘！
strTitle: 【出來玩就是要搭遊艇阿】韓國濟州島 香格里拉遊艇體驗

strIntroduction: The first place that comes to mind when people think of fall foliage in Korea is definitely Seoraksan Mountain. Taking the cable car up to the mountain top, you can see the mountain cloaked in autumn's warm hues of red and gold. Enjoying the nice view with hot spring when you stay at Hanwha Resort Seorak Sorano. It's definitely a relaxed experience!
strTitle: Mt.Seoraksan Maple Watching Springs Resort Two-day Tour

strIntroduction: With KKday airport shuttle service, you don't have to carpool with others!
strTitle: ICN airport to Seoul shuttle service (outside the defined area)

strIntroduction: Summertime only! Besides paying a visit to Sanmeoru Farm to become more familiar with the process of producing red wine, we'll also show you the Lavender farm and bring you to the herb soap making and red wine classes. However, the best part is that, we'll all have a bottle of red wine at the end! Wanna have a different one-day tour? Just come and join us!
strTitle: Experience in Sanmeoru Farm+Lavender Garden+Yeoju Premium Outlets one-day tour

strIntroduction: 想要對韓國有更深的認識嗎？最能感受當地文化的旅遊方式－環韓巴士K-Shuttle。誰說光觀巴士只能走馬看花？穿越首爾、忠清道、全羅道、慶尚道以及全州的＂韓國走透透＂。上車吧！一同領略西海岸的人文及自然風光！
strLocation: Korea, Jeonju, Gyeongnam, Gyeongbuk, Chungnam, Chungbuk, Jeonnam, Jeonbuk, Seoul, Busan
strTitle: 【K-Shuttle環韓巴士】韓國西海岸3天2夜一次玩透透

strIntroduction: Enjoy a day trip to the coastal city of Gyeongju and discover the Silla Dynasty, a united kingdom that ruled Korea from 668–935 AD. On this full-day tour, visit the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Bulguksa temple and its hermitage, Seokguram Grotto. Climb the astronomical observatory of Cheomseongdae and search for Silla treasures at the Gyeongju National Museum. Hear informative commentary from a local guide who takes you by comfortable minivan to see these regional highlights.
strTitle: Gyeongju City Tour

strIntroduction: 你知道嗎？據說中國宋代商船前往韓國時，遇到了突如其來的暴風，其中某艘裝滿奇珍異寶的船不幸沉沒於遮歸島海域。想跟著海盜一起尋寶嗎？專屬於韓國的One Piece等你來體驗！
strTitle: 【韓國也有海賊王！】濟州遮歸島 海盜潛水艇大冒險

strIntroduction: 內藏山一年四季景緻各有千秋，總是讓前來的遊客流連忘返，尤其到了滿山紅葉染上天際，像著了火的楓葉隧道與道德瀑布、金仙瀑布形成的醉人風景，稱之為丹楓秘境也不為過。今年就由元歐爸帶您出發賞楓，一訪韓國最美麗的角落！
strTitle: 【韓國元OBBA帶路】此生必訪秘境！內藏山賞楓一日遊

strIntroduction: 今夏最夯農村體驗！讓我們帶你前往超人回來了雙胞胎－書言和書俊最愛的蘋果西瓜農場，享受今夏的甜蜜滋味！還帶你一覽韓國忠清南道牙山市，一賞韓國地方風情，快來和KKDAY一起深入探索韓國吧！
strTitle: 【親近大自然】蘋果西瓜農場，世界花卉植物園＋地中海村一日遊

strIntroduction: 厭倦了傳統的行程，想體驗新鮮元素？首爾時尚風情一日遊，感受這座城新奇浪漫的一面！將前往首爾商務金融中心德黑蘭路、韓流明星時常光顧的時尚流行最前線—新沙洞林蔭道、首爾最大的地下商場—COEX Mall以及COEX水族館，這些都是年輕人的最愛。
strTitle: 【流行時尚殿堂】韓國首爾時尚風情一日遊，新沙洞 COEX水族館 仁寺洞

strIntroduction: 從曖昧到穩定交往都適合的，couple約會首選餐廳，飽覽首爾市中心美麗景緻的同時享受一流的服務和高品質美食。＂今天我要和你一起在雲海中約會＂，與另一伴漫步在雲端，一同享受高水準的美食吧！
strTitle: 【我要在雲海中與你約會】首爾Top Cloud雲端餐廳自助餐券

strIntroduction: 看著海景，吃濟州島最新鮮的海鮮，還可以品嚐當地人做的醬蟹和小菜！優惠的價格享受美食～
strTitle: 【新鮮美食饕客】韓國濟州島西歸浦雲海生魚片餐券

strIntroduction: 這次的韓國旅遊是跟誰來的呢？是背包客獨自旅行、跟三五好友一同出國，還是和心愛的另一半享受難得的甜蜜旅行呢？＂戒指大學戒指工坊＂除了能夠手做純銀戒指外，純銀手鍊、項鍊也都全包下了！想替這次的旅行留下紀念嗎？來戒指大學準沒錯！
strTitle: 【閃閃發亮戒指村】 韓國首爾，獨一無二手作體驗

strIntroduction: 來韓國想去的地方太多不知道從何下手？景點間距離太遠，時間都花在交通上面了？一日遊的行程讓你在最短的時間把最Hot的景點都走一遍！從帥氣的換崗儀式、傳統人文風景的仁寺洞到最浪漫的N首爾塔...趁這次讓自己和首爾談場戀愛吧！
strTitle: 【和首爾談戀愛】深深愛上你，韓國首爾甜蜜一日遊

strIntroduction: 精選浪漫優雅的行程。在歐洲風情的翡翠花園散心，貴婦聚集地清潭洞感受高貴氣息，新沙洞的特色商店，喝杯咖啡享受文青的一日，淬煉心靈的另一境界～
strTitle: 【那年冬天風在吹】江原道翡翠花園 清潭洞咖啡廳 新沙洞一日遊

strIntroduction: 帶著小孩到韓國自由行，還在擔心行程的安排嗎？交給我們就對了！在兩天的行程中將帶你到聖誕老人村近距離接觸可愛的羊兒，再到韓劇、韓綜我們結婚了的經典拍攝地瑞士村及香草島樂園，留下美美相片及美好回憶！此外，前往One Mount的夢幻冰雪國及水上樂園，一次滿足大人跟小孩的願望！
strTitle: 【一起FUN 暑假】 瑞士村＋香草島樂園 One Mount樂園 2日遊

strIntroduction: 說到韓國最具代表性的食物是什麼？泡菜？烤肉？答錯了，這些都不是！源自朝鮮時代君王食用的御用宮廷料理，遊訪韓國想體驗在地文化的你，絕對不能錯過韓國最傳統的料理—韓定食喔！
strTitle: 【這就是韓國味！】享用明洞韓定食料理，還提供韓服著裝拍照

strIntroduction: 馬西搜優！首爾新風潮都市療愈系餐廳Caffe Mov使用新鮮的材料製作，讓您品嘗來自自營農場的有機蔬菜做成的絕妙料理！在這個講求健康飲食的時代，位於韓國最繁華地段江南瑞草區蠶院洞的Caffe Mov，絕是您會想一來再來的餐廳喔！
strTitle: 【馬西搜優！新鮮食材好美味】首爾江南義大利餐廳Caffe Mov現金券

strTitle: 【Depart from Taipei】Taiwan High Speed Railway 15% Discount e-ticket（For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: Are you still waiting for airport bus? Are you still carrying your luggages to transfer? Make reservations of "KKday airport pick-up service" at once. Professional drivers take you to the appointed location, cosy and fast.
strTitle: Airport pick-up service：International Taoyuan Airport - Taipei City area (up to four people)

strIntroduction: It takes many trains and transfer buses to reach the various sites and districts of Taipei. If you only have one free day and you want to visit Pingxi, Shifen waterfall, the North Coast, and Jiufen, traveling will take up a lot of your time. But with a Taipei 8-hour chartered shuttle, you can choose where you want to go and visit all the attractions you want.
strTitle: 8-hour Classic Chartered Taipei day tour

strIntroduction: Taipei 101 is one of the must see tourist spot in Taiwan. In addition to taking spectacular photos outside of the buidling, why not take the fastest elevator in the world to arrive at the 89th floor and enjoy the beautiful landscape of great Taipei area. Now just by showing your booking success notification email from KKday, you can simply enjoy the prosperous street view without lining up for ticket.
strTitle: 【Skip The Line】Taipei 101 Observatory e-ticket

strIntroduction: Easy getting in and out of Cingjing Farm, express ride super convenient. Customers can specify the pickup locations in Taichung airport, high-speed railway Taichung station, Taichung train station by the express shuttle to Cingjing bed & breakfast, and vice versa.
strTitle: Cingjing Farm with shuttle service

strIntroduction: Enjoy the lovely mountain and sea vistas, as you tour the majestic Taroko Gorge and the beauty of the East Rift Valley of Taitung and Hualien, along Taiwan’s eastern seaboard. This tour will depart with even only one passenger, the shuttle visits Hualien’s bed and breakfast inns, so sit back and enjoy the ride!
strTitle: Day tour to Taroko Gorge

strIntroduction: Stand atop Taiwan’s location nearest to the sun, and welcome the sunrise! From Hehuan Mountain take in views of Taroko and the Cingjing Veterans Farm, with its incredibly beautiful views and wonderful, clean mountain air! Enjoy your unforgettable itinerary with kkday today!
strTitle: Hehuan Mountain Sunrise Tour

strIntroduction: THSR pass is entitled to ride on THSR trains an unlimited number of times for 3 days or any 3 days within the specified week. Easy to have fun traveling to major scenic spots in Taiwan's the western region.
strTitle: Taiwan High Speed Rail (THSR) 3-day / flexible 3-day pass（For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: Shared ride to Jiufen / Shifen / Pingxi is the perfect option for travelers. The route includes all the classic attractions and must-go like Jinguashi, Jiufen, Pingxi, Shifen. It's daily depart and ideal for small group travel.
strTitle: 1-day tour around Jiufen, Shifen and Pingxi

strIntroduction: A classic trip not to be missed when in Taichung! Get the inside track with our driver-guide as he takes you to places only the locals know. What are you waiting for? Hurry, book a car and go play!
strTitle: 10-hour chartered Taichung day tour

strIntroduction: Avoid the queues and early morning ticket fighting and guarantee your place on two of the most well-known Alishan Mountain train rides: The main Alishan Forest Railway line (Fenqihu Station - Chiayi Railway), the Zhushan line (the highest railway in Taiwan), and other famous attractions such as Alishan Sacred Tree and Sisters Lakes. Tour around Fenqihu Old Street and taste the famous Fenqihu lunchbox.
strTitle: Alishan Forest and Zhushan Sunrise Two day Forest Railroads Tour

strIntroduction: KKday invites you to join us for fun in Kenting, take our shared transfer to Kenting, and save money compared to bus fares with Rideshare comfort! For only US$9 you can enjoy a comfortable 9 person shuttle direct to all the Kenting B&B inns. The two hour journey will take you across the beautiful Taiwan Coastal Highway, as you enjoy the comfort of our shuttle and the beautiful blue seas. . .
strTitle: 【Kaohsiung to Kenting transport】 Kaoshiung Kenting return shuttle bus

strIntroduction: The Leofoo Village is the first theme park that combines many attractions of different styles such as a safari wildlife park and roller coasters. It is also the theme park handpicked by the Korean variety show, Running Man, when it was shot in Taiwan. KKday and Leofoo Village have now launched an e-ticket exclusively for foreign tourists. Price: NT$640 (US$19.5), worth NT$999, for admission to both the Leofoo Village Water Park.
strTitle: Leofoo Village Theme Park e-tickets （For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: Rainbow grandpa's dream of a beautiful artistic style turns the entire small town into a colorful world. A literary and artistic trip that young hipsters cannot miss in Taichung.
strTitle: Taichung Rainbow Village Tour with shuttle services.

strIntroduction: Visit nine attractions and landmarks in Kenting in one trip! Are you still seeing Kenting in a rented electric skooter? Save money with KKday for a Kenting carpool trip, for a one day trip throughout Kenting!
strTitle: Day tour to Kenting

strIntroduction: Well-known scenic sites in Taipei's Northeast include: Yehliu, Jiufen, and Shifen. Want to see the famous Queen’s Head at Yehliu in the morning? Savor taro at Jiufen for lunch? And light up sky lanterns at Shifen in the afternoon? There's also the famous Vigor Kobo DIY pineapple cakes! It all makes for the perfect one-day Taipei trip.
strTitle: 1-day tour around Yehli, Jiufen, Shifen

strIntroduction: This 10 hour Taipei charter tour Gives you even more! Survey the north coast on this incomparable bus tour. Visit Wan Li Jade Bay, Queens Head Rock and other geological sites in Ye Liu. Stop at great photo opportunities like the rock groves in Shimen (at Lao Mei Shi Cao) and of course "Turtle Roar Harbor" (Gui Hou Harbor), where you can get fresh seafood at set prices. And let's not forget a visit to the North Coast Cafe For a relaxing "tea time" while you enjoy the coastal scenery. Coming to Taipei doesn't mean you have to be in a rush. This bus tour gives you 10 hours of sites at a leisurely pace.
strTitle: 10-hour chartered Taipei day tour

strIntroduction: The most beautiful sunset is Taiwan is known to shine over the Gaomei Wetlands. The wind farms seem like an array of windmills set amidst the Wetlands, whose beautiful sunsets seem like they are right out of a Gauguin painting. It is an immensely pleasing experience and couples inevitably find it to be unforgettable! Tours are available daily! ！
strTitle: Half day trip to Taichung Gaomei wetland

strIntroduction: Visit the five wonders of Alishan in one trip: the kaleidoscopic views of Alishan’s famous sunrise, the vast expanse of clouds, and colorful sunset, surrounded by towering forests and the world famous Alishan train.
strTitle: Alishan one night tour. Take the train tour for sunrise, visit the clouds atop the mountains, and enjoy the sunset

strIntroduction: The latest craze in the Japanese media is the new attraction of the beautiful Blue Hole in the Penghu islands. Whether you have been to the Penghu islands before, the Blue Hole is an attraction you cannot miss. If you have been to the Penghu islands, you probably feel like me, and wonder why you missed going to the Blue Hole? Even if you are only going to visit Penghu just to see the Blue Hole it is worth it!
strTitle: 1-day tour around Penghu Blue Hole and Cimei Island

strIntroduction: Must-have packages for Alishan independent travelers! The Alishan Small Train is the most popular activity and, therefore, extremely difficult to book. KKday ensures that you can experience the Alishan Forest Railway and Zhushan Sunrise line. No more early queuing for tickets or advance telephonic reservations, just enjoy the unique experience of Alishan Forest Railway!
strTitle: Tickets for Alishan Forest Railway and Chusan Line Sunrise Train with shuttle services.

strIntroduction: Arrival at Taichung Airport. The taxi fare is between NT$300–500. KKday provides a shared shuttle to Taichung Airport at just US$5. Customers get to enjoy a comfortable shared ride directly to the hotel in the city, which can save time and money!
strTitle: Airport Shuttle service from Taichung Airport to Taichung City Area

strIntroduction: A designated shuttle will take you directly from Cingjing Farm to Sun Moon Lake. You don’t have to worry about transportation, making it so much easier for you to get around central Taiwan.
strTitle: Cingjing to Sun Moon Lake shuttle service

strIntroduction: Take a leisurely stroll up the mountains in Alishan and wander among the cherry blossoms before returning back down by shuttle bus. Enjoy the perfect and easiest way to take in Alishan's cherry blossoms!
strTitle: Alishan 1-day tour (with complimentary Fenqihu lunch box)

strIntroduction: On-site tickets cost much more at NT$300. KKday only US$4.
strTitle: Sun Moon Lake 1-day boat tour ticket

strIntroduction: Helmet diving in the Penghu seafloor is one type of scuba diving, but you do not have to carry your own oxygen tanks. All you need is to put on a helmet and you are ready to dive to 6m deep seafloors to enjoy the stunningly beautiful marine life. When you return to shore, your hair won’t even be wet, so this is the perfect means to diving for women or families with children diving together!
strTitle: Using Helmet Diving and Sea walk in Penghu

strIntroduction: In Penghu you simply have to try the night time Neritic Squid fishing. You also have to try the Sea Farm fresh oysters. You will enjoy the beautiful beaches and water fun activities. Then during the last day you will see the beauty of the southern Sea with the Cimei Twin-Heart Stone Weir and amazing Blue Hole. Your three day journey is sure to please and is an outstanding value!
strTitle: 3-Day Penghu Special Inclusive Tour Package

strIntroduction: The National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium offers a unique sleepover experience. You can explore the Aquarium behind the scenes, allowing guests of all ages to interact with the marine life. It is an experience completely unlike interaction during the daytime. There are many activities, and you will surely leave with unforgettable memories. So hurry and select the area you most want to sleepover in, if you don’t hurry you miss the limited opportunity...
strTitle: Sleep over in Kenting at the National Museum of Marine Biology and Aquarium

strIntroduction: The one and only ecological resort in Asia - Leofoo Resort Hsinchu. Exclusive to KKday, we have a package of a 2-day trip, where children could interact with animals closely, while parents could enjoy the hotel's 5-star service and amenities. Having fun for 2 days in Leofoo Village Theme Park, joining a adventure to the prairie, and feeding herbivorous animals in close distance, will give you an unique experience with animals.
strTitle: 2-Day Trip in Leofoo Animal Resort

strIntroduction: Are you still waiting for airport bus? Are you still carrying your luggages to transfer? Make reservations of "KKday airport pick-up service" at once. Professional drivers take you to the appointed location, cosy and fast.
strTitle: Airport pick up service from International Taoyuan Airport to Taipei City Area (Max. 8 people)

strIntroduction: No visit to Kenting would be complete without experiencing the relaxing atmosphere of South Bay. Enjoy the white sands, blue sea and sky, and colorful sunshades dotted all around with people in bikinis and trunks paddling in the water or just strolling around the streets.
strTitle: Water sports experience in South Bay, Kenting.Free shuttle service provided from Kenting Main Street.

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway 15% Discount e-ticket. Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: 【Depart from Zuoying】Taiwan High Speed Railway 15% Discount e-ticket（For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: Taitung's hot air balloon experience gives you the choice of going up in a moored (anchored) hot air ballon or the freedom of flight (Free-Flight) which will not only allow you to fly like a bird but will also give you a 360 degree "birds eye" view of Taitung's Valleys, allowing you to enjoy Taitung's beautiful, bright and colorful sunrises. This dreamlike journey is sure to be a once in a lifetime experience.
strTitle: Taitung's Free-Flight Hot-Air Balloon Experience

strIntroduction: As Taiwan’s Northeastern coastline comes into view enjoy the blue sky and picturesque white clouds, as you take in the special Nanyaqiyan rock formation with its weathering and marine abrasion formed geological landscape of Bitoujiao, and experience all the Northeast corner’s beautiful scenery along the coastline, as you chase the ocean breeze!
strTitle: 1-day tour to North-east Taiwan

strIntroduction: Do you remember Takuya Kimura's short clip on tourism in Taiwan? It was filmed on location at the Volando Urai Spring Spa & Resort. Join Takuya Kimura and leave behind the madding crowd’s city life to go enjoy hot springs and scenic views, and rejuvenate your soul with tantalizing food. Wait no more — come to Wulai and take a deserved break!
strTitle: Volando Wulai Spring house for 2 (inclusive of a set meal / tea set for 2)

strIntroduction: 一天走完東北角特殊地質景觀、九份山城小鎮的傳統風情～一起跟著KKday體驗不一樣的台北。
strTitle: Classic Jiufen and North-eastern coast day tour

strIntroduction: In the film “You are the Apple of My Eye”,the Pingxi railway becomes famous site for travelers, let's follow the footprints.
strTitle: Day tour to Pingxi, Shifen, and Jingtong

strIntroduction: Save up time & money with KKday's Taiwan 4G prepaid sim card! Get connected right after you landed! Surf with the best 4G network in Taiwan now!
strTitle: Taiwan 4G prepaid sim card（Pick-up at Taoyuan Airport）

strIntroduction: Hualien offers excellent whale and dolphin viewing opportunities, you will enjoy a very high likelihood of seeing whales and dolphins on your trip, and a variety of other marine biodiversity, too. On your visit to Hualien, shouldn’t you come see the whales, too? Every trip to sea brings with it amazing and unforgettable new discoveries.
strTitle: Meet the Whales and Dolphins in Hualien

strIntroduction: A place not to be missed when in the vicinity of Taipei — welcome to the fantastic wonderland of Thousand Island Lake. Its name was derived from Qiandao Lake in Mainland China. The area was formed by the surrounding Feitsui Reservoir and Beishi River, giving it the impression of many mountains when looking down from the Yong'an Mountain Trail. Bays of green waters are nestled among the luscious and serene mountains while the Ba Gua Tea Garden beckons visitors over. Thousand Island Lake has everything you’d want in a vacation in Taiwan!
strTitle: Shiding thousand island lake, Ba Gua tea garden and Shiding Old street 1-day tour

strIntroduction: Tour the north coast and enjoy the ever-changing geological landscape of Yehliu as you bear witness to the full force and magic of Mother Nature. Then take in the sights and sounds of Tamsui Old Street and go on a walking tour of the Juming Museum. Escape to the north coast and leave the stress and noise of city life behind and be enchanted by the beauty of nature!
strTitle: 1-day tour around Yehliu, Tamsui and Juming Museum

strIntroduction: How can you miss skin diving if you come to Kenting? Look at the colorful underwater seaworld of Kenting, even if you don't know how to swim, just put on the skin diving gear, follow our instructor's orders, and you can easily relax and explore the beautiful seaworld of Kenting.
strTitle: Experience Skin Diving at Houbihu, Kenting

strIntroduction: Taiwan High Speed Railway booking at KKday！Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: 【Depart from Taichung】Taiwan High Speed Railway 15% Discount e-ticket（For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: KKday summer madness discount！ Save up time & money with our High Speed Railway e-ticket！
strTitle: 【Depart from Chayi】Taiwan High Speed Railway 15% Discount e-ticket（For overseas tourists only)

strIntroduction: Experience Paragliding at Puli, Nantou County, enjoy paragliding in the sky of Puli, taking in the view of mountain ranges before you and feel the winds as you soar in the sky, look below you to see the beautiful landscape of Puli, you wouldn't want to touch the ground after this wondrous experience.
strTitle: Experience Paragliding at Puli, Nantou County

strIntroduction: If you desire to directly travel to central Taiwan, and avoid the longer northern route, you can select either direction of the Hualien route which goes straight from Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns, to Wuling and Taroko Gorge, then direct to Cingjing or Hualien bed and breakfast inns or hotels. This allows you to enjoy all the sites of Taiwan’s highest elevation highway.
strTitle: Return trip from Hualien to Cingjing across Taiwan's highest highway

strIntroduction: Creative new experience in Taichung! Journey of delicious cuisine or amazing scenery! One-day trip in Taichung by charter car service is just what you need!
strTitle: Charter Car day tour in Taichung (limited in Taichung City only)

strIntroduction: Traveling to Hualien, you will definitely pass through SuHua highway, which is on the east coast of Taiwan. On this scenic highway ride, you can see the Pacific Ocean on one side, and the magnificent cliffs on the other. If you want to experience these beautiful sceneries, you can choose the Taipei-Hualien bus tour, which takes a different route from train rides, and enjoy the marvel of Hualien on the way.
strTitle: 1-day tour around Taipei, Jiufen, Hualien

strIntroduction: 大台南小旅行。舊景色，新景點。來台南包車旅遊，帶你玩光台南大小景點。
strTitle: 台南包車・彈性8HR文青小旅行，發現台南

strIntroduction: 行程超自由，時間超方便，讓你玩耍高雄好輕鬆。美濃、旗山，輕鬆到達。暢遊高雄最佳選擇，KKday包車樂悠悠。
strTitle: 高雄包車・彈性8HR《熱情打狗》高雄美濃、旗山(舊高雄縣)

strIntroduction: 一日高雄人，終生高雄魂。身為高雄人，就一定要來駁二特區，體驗南台灣的藝術熱情拉～ 快跟著KKday腳步，帶你變身高雄魂！
strTitle: 【藝文高雄】高雄駁二藝術特區包車一日遊/半日遊

strIntroduction: 神秘高雄，與佛光山大彿的先見歡，了解台灣當地民俗信仰。晚上再到瑞豐夜市，嘗試台灣在地小吃，保證會愛上台灣味。
strTitle: 高雄包車・彈性8HR-來去佛光山看大彿(舊高雄縣)

strIntroduction: The only way to experience the oceanic lifestyle is to take a ferry ride to Green Island! If you are lucky, you might be able to see flying fish, dolphins while you on board of the ferry to the beautiful Green Island.
strTitle: Green Island Ferry Ticket (Departing from Fugang Taitung)

strIntroduction: 高雄唯一的主題樂園，好玩又刺激。全台灣最大的outlet也在這裡，一起來這裡尋找最低折扣吧！！
strTitle: 高雄包車・彈性8HR-高雄唯一的遊樂園、瑞豐夜市(舊高雄縣)

strIntroduction: 老城鎮，新走法；老味道，新體驗。台南文青小旅行，不一樣的台灣味。
strTitle: 【輕旅行】北門水晶教堂，台南拼車一日小旅行（高雄天天出發）

strIntroduction: The East Rift Valley is the geographical landform in between the Central Mountain Range and the Coastal Mountain Range. Standing below the high mountain range, you will find the East Rift Valley seems like a picturesque poetry. The magnificent view will take you away from reality. This trip starts off from your place of stay in Hualien, and will bring you to all MUST SEE scenic spots in Hualien.
strTitle: 1-day tour around East Rift Valley

strIntroduction: 玩高雄好方便，旗津夕陽、六合夜市一次玩透透！還有四小時速遊方案，讓忙碌的人也可以稍微放鬆一下！
strTitle: 【旗津夕陽】高雄市區包車一日遊/半日遊

strIntroduction: The hot days of summer are the perfect season to see the Orange Day Lily (also known as the Lotus) which blooms at dusk (and sheds its pedals in the daylight) in Fuli's Sixty Stone Mountains. Appreciate the golden flowers, gently swaying in the breeze, under the blue skies. It's a great opportunity to take in all of nature as you appreciate this wonderful flower.
strTitle: 1-Day trip to Hualien's Sixty Stone Mountains (Taitung starting point)

strIntroduction: This two-day, one-night itinerary, is a relaxing journey in which you can leisurely cycle through the beautiful, mountainous scenery. Climb to the heights of Luyeh in Gaotai county, crisscrossing through paths on the endless plains with unending views of rice paddies and tea plantations. Come back to the hot springs hotel spa in the evening to enjoy a soak in the unique hot "carbonic beauty" spring.
strTitle: 2-Day at the Taitung Chihpen Hot Springs Tour

strIntroduction: Convenient shuttle roundtrip! Not only saving your money, No more wasting time with public transportation! Come join us a ride!
strTitle: 【Alishan Shuttle Trip 】 Enjoy the roundtrip from Chiayi Station to Alishan

strIntroduction: Sun Moon Lake is the must visit scenic site in Taiwan, you will stop at every angle of the lake to admire its beautiful scenary, in this tour we will take you on a boat ride, a bicycle tour around the lake and a cable car ride to enjoy the beauty of Sun Moon Lake enabling you to deeply understand and admire Sun Moon Lake in all its angles and scopes.
strTitle: Nantou Sun Moon Lake Bicycle Round Trip , Ferry Ride and Sun Moon Lake Cable Ride One Day Tour

strIntroduction: In the sparkling summer at Green Island, you can see tourists in Tee shirts and shorts exploring this island under the tropical sun, many others get on a scooter and explore the island riding through mountains and along the sea, let's go for a skin diving, hot spring and sunrise watching experience with this exciting tour.
strTitle: Green Island Skin Diving 2-Days Package Tour

strIntroduction: 吃麻辣鍋還只是想辣得過癮，那就落伍囉！不同於以往麻辣鍋強調的辣度口感，《紅九九》重新詮釋麻辣鍋以「重麻不重辣」的口感、個人鍋方式，打造專屬自己的麻辣鍋全新體驗。
strTitle: 【食尚玩家推薦】國館站限定。紅九九個人麻辣火鍋抵用券

strIntroduction: Visit all the must see scenic sites at Hualien. From the magnificent Taroko National Park to the beautiful Seven Star Lake, you can go anywhere you want on a 10- hours chartered bus. Enjoy the flexibility of the trip and decide your destination on your own.
strTitle: 10-hour chartered Hualien day tour

strIntroduction: You can choose your own visiting sites in Kenting with a chartered vehicle, or you can follow the recommended tour sites, it takes approximately two days to cover all scenic areas in Kenting, travelling either from the north or south of Kenting to Kenting Street, if you have no idea how to begin your trip, our chartered driver have many sites they can share with you.
strTitle: 8-hour chartered Kenting day tour

strIntroduction: Enjoy the mountain peaks surrounded with the rosy red sun at dusk amidst the sea of clouds, as you encounter Alishan’s mysterious and mystical Giant Tree Plank Trail, where you will feel just how tiny humanity seems compared to Mother Nature’s grandeur. Enjoy your trip with our professional Tour Guide through this amazing forest path.
strTitle: Tour around Alishan Giant tree plank trail and forest railway.

strIntroduction: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain has become famous for its fields of lilies. Every year, from August to October, at an altitude of 800-1400 meters, this incredible bloom covers the mountain from top to bottom. Looking down from Wangyou Gorge the horizon is filled with a sea of golden flowers. This bloom happens once a year and is an absolute can not miss. You must make a vacation out of Taitung's spectacular Lily bloom.
strTitle: Taitung's Taimali Lily Mountain Half Day Charterd Tour
